Sentencas: We have designed and prepared SrMo1-xGaxO3-delta (x = 0.1 and 0.2) perovskite oxides.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: Their performance as anode materials in intermediate-temperature solid-oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFC) has been investigated.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: The characterization of these oxides included X-ray (XRD) and neutron powder diffraction (NPD) for x = 0.1 and 0.2.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: At room temperature, SrMo1-xGaxO3-delta perovskites are defined in the Pm-3m space group.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: The crystal structure is defined as a simple-cubic perovskite unit cell, as observed from NPD data.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: The electrical conductivity gave maximum values of 268 and 58 Scm(-1) at 850 degrees C for x = 0.1 and x = 0.2, respectively.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: In single test cells these materials generated output powers near 900 mW/cm(-2) at 850 degrees C using pure H-2 as fuel, and demonstrated substantial performance with CH4.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: Polarization curves and electrochemical impedance spectra (EIS) under open circuit were investigated.
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC

Sentencas: An adequate thermal expansion coefficient, an excellent reversibility upon cycling in oxidizing reducing atmospheres and chemical compatibility with the electrolyte make these oxides perfect candidates for anodes in intermediate -temperature SOFC (IT-SOFCs).
Titulo: Design of new Ga-doped SrMoO3 perovskites performing as anode materials in SOFC
